title: Requires a specific recommendation by a certified psychologist or a certified nurse practitioner of the type of residence in which a patient is to live upon release
summary: Requires a specific recommendation by a certified psychologist or a certified nurse practitioner of the type of residence in which a patient is to live upon release into the community.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1481

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 10, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  ROSENTHAL  --  read once and referred to the
         Committee on Mental Health

       AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the discharge and
         release of patients into the community

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  2  of  subdivision (g) of section 29.15 of the
    2  mental hygiene law, as amended by chapter 433 of the laws  of  1976,  is
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    2. a specific recommendation MADE BY EITHER THE CERTIFIED PSYCHOLOGIST
    5  OR  A CERTIFIED NURSE PRACTITIONER of the type of residence in which the
    6  patient is to live and a  listing  of  the  services  available  to  the
    7  patient in such residence.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
    9  it shall have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00960-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the discharge and release of patients into the community
